name: OpenTTD
description: OpenTTD is the open source version of Transport Tycoon Deluxe (TTD). The player plays the owner of newly established transport company, through construction of railways, highways, bridges, airports, stations and other facilities to maximize profits. He will become the Transport Tycoon by fierce competition after defeated the opponent.

en_US.description: OpenTTD is the open source version of Transport Tycoon Deluxe (TTD). The player plays the owner of newly established transport company, through construction of railways, highways, bridges, airports, stations and other facilities to maximize profits. He will become the Transport Tycoon by fierce competition after defeated the opponent.
en_US.name: OpenTTD

zh_CN.description: OpenTTD是 一款运输大亨豪华版（TTD）的开源版。玩家扮演新成立的运输公司老板，通过建设铁路、公路、桥梁、机场、车站等设施，运输旅客、货物和各种自然资源来赚取最大利润，经过残酷的竞争，最终打败对手，成为运输大亨。
zh_CN.name: OpenTTD
